# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe holds significant value for those seeking high-quality solutions. Considering its exceptional features and benefits, I'm extending this exclusive opportunity to you. For a limited time, I'm offering it to you at an introductory price of $180. This is a special deal tailored for discerning individuals like yourself who appreciate top-tier products. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your experience with our product. Let me know if you have any questions or need more information. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $180. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $180
(2) Reject Alice's offer
